metadata.title: CVE-2022-31783 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Liblouis 3.21.0 has an out-of-bounds write in compileRule in compileTranslationTable.c, as demonstrated by lou_trace.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-31783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.18.0-1ubuntu0.2
liblouis-data - 3.18.0-1ubuntu0.2
liblouis20 - 3.18.0-1ubuntu0.2
python3-louis - 3.18.0-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.18.0-1ubuntu0.2').
